post.desc:
In *Magical Astronomy*, Merry says this at the start of [***Satellite Café Terrace***](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Magical_Astronomy/Story#衛星カフェテラス). Like, Renko went on explaining about how physics is ending 'cause it's become practically impossible to go any smaller and they've run out of observable stuff, the field becoming less experiments and more interpretations.

But I suppose this is kinda like a return to its roots? 'Cause physics was **natural philosophy**.
